about_the_game:
Jungle Book

This Jungle book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images are of the wonderful wildlife you can only find in the jungles of our world!

Get ready to explore and discover what wonders are hidden inside the dense underbrush of the Jungle!

Contents

The Jungle Book unlocks the following images:
  • Waterfall - 42x42
  • Flora - 63x63
  • Footprint - 92x92
  • Tiger - 94x95
  • Fauna - 96x87
  • River - 97x132
  • Stream - 100x100
  • Poisonous Dart Frog - 104x69
  • Jungle Animals - 106x98
  • Exploration - 112x82
  • Snake - 120x120
  • Capybara Pond - 149x72
  • Platformer - 152x92
  • Bugs - 152x192
  • Jungle Cave - 159x117
  • Pathway - 160x130
  • Crocodile Swamp - 177x122
  • Jungle Golem - 181x101
  • Tree Vines - 182x100
  • Prehistoric Jungle - 235x150

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Jungle Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
